mapper.select: SELECT sys_user.user_id, sys_user.login_name, sys_user.password, sys_user.user_name, sys_user.head_icon, sys_user.simple_spelling, sys_user.gender_code, sys_user.gender_name, sys_user.mobile, sys_user.tel, sys_user.email, sys_user.wechat, sys_user.qq, sys_user.manage_id, sys_user.manager, sys_user.organize_id, sys_user.department_id, sys_user.is_license_check, sys_user.first_visit, sys_user.previous_visit, sys_user.last_visit, sys_user.employee_state, sys_user.employee_state_dec, sys_user.user_state, sys_user.user_state_dec, sys_user.delete_mark, sys_user.enable_mark, sys_user.description, sys_user.create_user_id, sys_user.create_user_name, sys_user.create_date, sys_user.modify_user_id, sys_user.modify_user_name, sys_user.modify_date, sys_user.tenant_id, sys_user.create_time_stamp, sys_user.modify_time_stamp, sys_user.is_manager FROM sys_user
